long_description: The optimist hopes for good weather-the realist comes prepared with the Patagonia Tres 3-in-1 Parka. Wear the shell alone in the rain, add the zip-out jacket in cold, wet weather or hit the streets in the just the liner when the skies clear. Shell details include an adjustable, removable hood, a 2-way front zipper, a stand-up collar, a microfleece-lined chin guard and an external stormflap for wind protection. Durable, 2-layer stretch twill shell features a Durable Water Repellent finish to resist persistent moisture. Waterproof, breathable H2No(R) barrier adds mountaineering storm protection; inside lining wicks moisture, dries quickly and glides smoothly over layers. Shell pocketing includes 2 zippered handwarmer pockets and 1 chest pocket; shell length hits at the top of the thighs. Liner jacket has 2 handwarmer pockets and an internal chest pocket that doubles as a stuff sack; liner is hip length. Horizontal quilting and 600-fill-power premium European goose down warm the coldest city nights. Zip-out liner jacket attaches to shell via the front zipper and snapped loops at the cuffs and neck. Patagonia 3-in-1 Tres Parka has a regular fit.
